routing.comment: Oscilloscope Ch1 output → Physical Output1 (observe trigger)
Oscilloscope Ch2 output → Physical Output1 (observe trigger)

metadata.description: DS1140-PD with Oscilloscope Monitoring - Both channels observable on physical outputs
notes: This routes DS1140-PD outputs through oscilloscope for monitoring
Physical Output1 shows oscilloscope Ch1 (trigger signal)
Both channels visible on Moku internal oscilloscope display
Use fire_now.py or test_ds1140_pd.py to control firing
